nodes.text: The Theed Music Hall was a theater where popular musical entertainment took place. It was located in Theed, the capital city of the planet Naboo. A rotunda with a domed roof covered in green tile, the Music Hall contained a stage and a pit, from which specialized droids would come out and play music for the benefit of the audience. Spectators were seated in front of the stage, whether on ground-level or in balconies on the sides of the room.
